plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable an audio CD in the PC CD drive to be played through LogitechMediaServer. Requires CDDA2WAV to be installed.
plugin.creator: bpa
plugin.changes: -1.11 Update: fix to play whole CD on Squeezeplay, CDDB move to gnudb. Not tested on OSX

plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable an audio CD in the PC CD drive to be played through LogitechMediaServer. Includes CDDA2WAV and associated DLLs.
plugin.creator: bpa
plugin.changes: -1.11 Update: fix to play whole CD on Squeezeplay, CDDB move to gnudb

plugin.name: CDplayer
plugin.title: CDplayer
plugin.desc: A Plugin to enable an audio CD in the PC CD drive to be played through LogitechMediaServer. Requires CDDA2WAV to be installed. Use icedax for Ubuntu.
plugin.creator: bpa
plugin.changes: -1.11 Update: fix to play whole CD on Squeezeplay, CDDB move to gnudb
